snippet: The Justice Department will investigate whether the Baltimore Police Department engaged in a pattern of unconstitutional policing, a day after the mayor asked for an inquiry.
abstract: Justice Dept, following request from Mayor Stephanie Rawlings-Blake, will investigate wether Baltimore Police Dept engaged in pattern of unconstitutional policing; move follows indictment of six Baltimore officers in relation to death of Freddie Gray.

byline.original: By MATT APUZZO and SHERYL GAY STOLBERG

lead_paragraph: The Justice Department will investigate whether the Baltimore Police Department engaged in a pattern of unconstitutional policing, a day after the mayor asked for an inquiry.

headline.main: Justice Department Will Investigate Baltimore Police Practices
headline.print_headline: Justice Dept. Will Examine Baltimore’s Police Patterns
